author: Source: Stroudnewsand Journal
title: Sam Allardyce guides Sunderland to derby win over Newcastle Sam... - Stroudnewsand Journal
text:
Sam Allardyce became the fourth successive boss to bounce back from an opening defeat to beat arch-rivals Newcastle as Sunderland finally secured their first Barclays Premier League win of the season. However, he did so in controversial circumstances as the Magpies saw skipper Fabricio Coloccini sent off in first-half injury time for a professional foul seconds after Sunderland midfielder Lee Cattermole appeared to get away with two offences inside his own box.
 Stroudnewsand Journal.
